sections.heading: Enforcement of conventional mortgage or pledgeThe provisions of Articles 3246 and 3247 shall not prevent the enforcement of a conventional mortgage on or a pledge of movable or immovable property of the succession in a separate proceeding
sections.text: Enforcement of conventional mortgage or pledgeThe provisions of Articles 3246 and 3247 shall not prevent the enforcement of a conventional mortgage on or a pledge of movable or immovable property of the succession in a separate proceeding.
